mission statement
dave's mission is to eliminate the ever-widening gap between small and medium business brick and mortar stores and the challenges of providing an online presence. Consumers are increasingly going online using their mobile phones to view menus, check prices, read and submit reviews and seek local, non-chain establishments to spend their hard earned money. However, the change in that consumer behaviour has left locally owned, small and medium business out of the mobile and online equation. And we are here to help.
services
Pride is taken in every project and dave won't be satisfied until you are. Every website is coded uses the latest in web development frameworks to ensure the best possible user experience and site loading times.
essential web design package
early adopter special: $xxxxx
(regular $xxxxxx)
The essential web design package provides you with everything you need to get your website up and running.
 Custom-coded designs
Your business is unique, so why shouldn't your website be? Every website is custom-coded and designed; dave won't just stick your images and content into a template and call it a day.
 Responsive
Consumers are accessing websites on a growing variety of devices and screen sizes and it's critical that your website is optimized for every experience. While dave takes a mobile-first approach to design, he will ensure that your customers have an amazing experience regardless of device.
 Keep it simple - up to 3 pages
To ensure a positive user experience, all designs strive to be as minimalist as possible; up to 3 pages are included in this package. A fee of $100 applies for each additional page.
 Google optimization
With mobile now the preferred method for accessing websites, ensuring your website loads quickly is critical and impacts your searchability on Google. All code and images will be optimized to ensure it complies with Google's optimization requirements.
 AODA Compliance
As per the Accessibility for Ontarians with Disablities Act, websites for Ontario businesses must conform to accessibility standards by January 1, 2020. Some businesses may be excluded from this legislation, but it's important for your business to ensure that these basic standards are met.
 Manage your own content
Do you need to update your details or modify some text on your website? All sites are setup to enable you to modify content whenever you need using a content management system.
 Photo sourcing
dave will scour the web for stock photos that suit your website. If there is a cost to purchase the photo then that will be passed on to you without any additional charge. Of course, all options will be reviewed with you prior to pulling the trigger!
If you want to go the extra step and to hire a professional photographer for a custom photoshoot, dave can do the legwork for that too!
 HTTPS secure certificate*
Every website comes standard with a secure certificate installed that prevents malicious bots or users from injecting virus-laden code or ads into your website.
*conditional on your web hosting service permitting the use of third-party certificates.
monthly plus
$xxxxx/month
Let dave crunch the numbers and ensure third-party websites are providing accurate information of your business to consumers. This monthly package will provide you with detailed reports to help you understand how your business is perceived online and how your website is performing. There is a minimum subscription of 3 months for this service.
 Google analytics setup
dave will setup Google analytics tracking on your website to enable reporting that allows you to track users and learn more about your customer base. This is a one-time setup.
 Monthly Google analytics report
This summary will provide you with details on traffic trends; how are people finding your site, are you attracting new users, how long are people staying on your site? If you're spending money to market online, how well is it performing? Keep tabs on the demographics of your users along - what age group do they fall into? what are their interests? This information is critical in understanding your audience and allow you to cater to them.
 Monthly report of third-party reviews
Keep tabs on how well your business is received on third-party websites, such as Google, Yelp, etc. This report will include all new reviews for the month as well as a month-to-month trend of your overall scores. Potential new customers are increasingly seeking online reviews
 Monthly audit of third-party data
Since information on third-party websites, such as Yelp, is user-generated it is not uncommon for your businesses information to be incorrect and therefore mislead customers. dave will conduct a monthly audit of popular third-party websites to ensure accuracy and report the results back to you.
portfolio
Below you'll find a sample of the work completed by dave, including this website itself!
This very light-weight, unique and minimalist design was inspired by Pat's approach to The Bar With No Name. The Bar With No Name has had a successful 8 years of providing a very laid-back, welcoming atmosphere serving local craft beer and high-quality homemade food and this design reflects that.
This very light-weight, unique and minimalist design was inspired by Pat's approach to The Bar With No Name. The Bar With No Name has had a successful 8 years of providing a very laid-back, welcoming atmostphere serving local craft beer and high-quality homemade food and this design reflects that.
about
With over 10 years programming experience developing applications to automate boring corporate reporting systems and processes, dave hamilton has transitioned to the exciting and always-dynamic world of web development and design! His broad experience with programming, report development and report visualization provides him with a well-rounded foundation to provide you with a unique and thoughtful approach to your website.
